instruction: Generate an opening sentence for a podcast about mental health.
output: Welcome to the Mental Health Matters podcast, where we explore the intersection between mental wellbeing and our everyday lives. This week, we’ll look at how our mindsets, thoughts, and feelings can affect how we interact with the world around us. Join us as we dive into the minds of experts, delve into our own selves, and seek to understand how we can use our own mental health to improve our overall quality of life.
